JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Farm worker - cow or pig farms #JobsForUkraine
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Serching for agricultural workers in Aarhus and Esbjerg areas.

We have clients searching for agricultural help in pig and cow farms all year round. Long term opportunity is possible.

The task is involving cleaning, feeding, milking, lifting, using small agricultural machines - depanding on the individual client's demand.

Other tasks such as gardening can also occur.

Approximately: 40-45 working hours/week provided. Overtime possible.

Accomodation is provided for free, usually in the farm area.

Requirements: intermediate english knowledge.

Advantage, but not a must: agricultural experience and "B" category driver's license.

Work period: all year around, 6 months contract periods.

Gross salary range: 1600-1900 €/month.

You can send your cv to cv@vikarexperten.dk

#JobsForUkraine
